text: Belgium competed at the 2018 Winter Paralympics in PyeongChang, South Korea, held from 9 to 18 March 2018. ==Team members== Two Belgian athletes are selected for the 2018 Games. ===Alpine skiing=== Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="3"|Run 1 !colspan="3"|Run 2 !colspan="3"|Final/Total |- !Time !Diff !Rank !Time !Diff !Rank !Time !Diff !Rank |- |rowspan=2|Jasper Balcaen |Slalom |colspan=6 |align="center"|1:53.94 |align="center"|+17.83 |align="center"|15 |- |Giant slalom |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"| |} *Jasper Balcaen (classification: LW9-1; already competed at the 2014 Winter Paralympics) Women {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="3"|Run 1 !colspan="3"|Run 2 !colspan="3"|Run 3 !colspan="3"|Total |- !Time !Diff !Rank !Time !Diff !Rank !Time !Diff !Rank !Time !Diff !Rank |- |rowspan=2|Eléonor Sana |Downhill, visually impaired |align="center"|1:36.96 |align="center"|+5.46 |align="center"|4 |colspan=6 |align="center"|1:31.60 |align="center"|+1.88 |align="center"| |- |Super-G, visually impaired |colspan=9 |align="center"|1:36.00 |align="center"|+5.83 |align="center"|4 |} * Eléonor Sana (classification: B2; debut; guided by her sister Chloé Sana) ==See also== * Belgium at the 2018 Winter Olympics ==References== Category:Nations at the 2018 Winter Paralympics 2018 Paralympics
title: Belgium at the 2018 Winter Paralympics
